name: The Perfect Gem
description:
[See Download Link below for free Novella of the Background Story]

The year is 2204 and gem dealers are rocked by the sudden appearance of several of the largest, most precious diamonds ever seen.  

Mercenary groups of humans, backed up by illegal 'Synths' are hired to track down the source of the gems, and tracks their origin back to a battered old freighter sat in the Caribbean 200 miles off the coast of South America.

The assault by a merc team goes badly, and it's left to you, Synth A3 with your two-word-based AI interface, to attempt a rescue, or continue the mission...

But things may not be entirely what they seem...

INSTRUCTIONS

  • All commands are two-word commands, e.g. "TURN WHEEL" or "DROP BOOK".
  • Objects can be manipulated with "GET", "DROP", "USE".
  • Some puzzles may also be solved using other verbs, but generally you can get by with the above three verbs.
  • In-game help is available using "HELP"
